Wehi团队在与帕金森氏病的斗争中取得了长足的进步WEHI研究人员在反对帕金森氏病的斗争中取得了巨大的飞跃，解决了长达数十年的谜团，这为开发新药治疗这种病铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/wehi-team-makes-makes-major-major-strides-in-the-the-fight-against-parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/wehi-team-makes-makes-major-major-strides-in-the-the-fight-against-parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee68E719-498C-498C-47F0-9C1C-3A571933BA4BE Fri, 14 Mar 2025 00:21:37 -0400 WEHI team makes major strides in the fight against Parkinson's disease

基于自然的疗法可能是疼痛管理的有希望的互补方法在一项新研究中，维也纳大学领导的一支国际神经科学家团队表明，体验自然可以减轻急性身体疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/nature-base-therapies-therapies-can-be-be-be-be-be-be-promising-complement-cmplactary-appraches-to-pain-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/nature oped-therapies-therapies-can-bebe-be-be-complemistary-applectary-pablecreactes-to-pain-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd0993f0-5ac9-4070-9e9999999-079410EEC4C9 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 23:31:00 -0400 Nature-based therapies can be promising complementary approaches to pain management
Cityuhk领导着开创性的项目开发新的平台以进行早期癌症检测癌症仍然是全球死亡率的主要原因，强调迫切需要开发更先进，高效和早期检测方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/cityuhk-leads-groundbreaking-proknebroking-project-to-develop-new-platform-for-early-canccanter-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/cityuhk-leads-groundbroking-project-project-to-develop-new-platform-for for-early-cancerl-cancer-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61dc0331-a091-44d7-ba0a-ba0a-fc4ae94a3bbbc Thu, 13 Mar 2025 23:27:03 -0400 CityUHK leads groundbreaking project to develop new platform for early cancer detection
新的实验室种植的猪视网膜器官可以帮助干细胞的视力治疗在人眼内，视网膜由几种类型的细胞组成，包括启动导致视力的事件级联的光感应感光体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/new-lab-grown-pig-retinal-organoids-could-aid-aid-stem-cell-stem-cell-基于基于基于vision-vision-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/new-lab-grown-pig-retinal-organoids-could-aid-aid-aid-stem-cell-stem-cell-comple-vision-vision-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04EA8D1C-09F2-4707-8713-A65F1A2A9331 Thu, 13 Mar 2025 23:15:11 -0400 New lab-grown pig retinal organoids could aid stem cell-based vision therapy
艾琳网络增强了欧洲的中风护理和患者的结果即使在一生都健康的人中，中风也可能是蓝色的。与其他一些逐渐发展的健康状况不同，当血液流向大脑中的血液流动在大脑动脉中时，中风突然发生，导致大脑几乎立即停止起作用。中风治疗的重要性是其极端的时间敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/irene-network-enhances-sstroke-care-care-care-care-and-patient-come-in-europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/irene-network-enhances-sstroke-care-care-care-and-patient-un-patient-uncomes-in-europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff540c50C50-FBCF-4CA8-957B-A1BD05779DBD Thu, 13 Mar 2025 23:09:15 -0400 IRENE network enhances stroke care and patient outcomes in Europe
帕金森氏病到2050年将影响2500万人。到2050年，全球帕金森氏病病例预计将超过两倍至2520万，这主要是由于人口老龄化和社会人口统计学因素的驱动。撒哈拉以南非洲和南亚的预计会增加最大的增长，男性受到不成比例的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/parkinsone28099s-disease-will-affect-2500万by-2050-study-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250313/parkinsone28099s-disease-will-affect-will-affect-2500万人by-2050-study-study-study-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=070C9982-35EA-4561-9A1C-C2CBA5A76EAA Thu, 13 Mar 2025 23:03:00 -0400 Parkinson’s disease will affect 25 million people by 2050, study warns
